ing: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup
des: "This wonderful little recipe can cook itself in your slow cooker while you're at work. The chops cook up so tender!  For all those non-mushroom eaters out there, puree the soup in your blender before adding it to the other ingredients."
ins:
Combine soup, ketchup, Worcestershire sauce, and onions in slow cooker. Add pork chops.
Cover, and cook on Low for 6 hours.
